title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 603.4 - Other redistribution and adjustment requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 603.4 - Other redistribution and adjustment requirements

State Regulations
A district must comply with such other procedures which
the department may require for the purpose of accurately ascertaining the
appropriate rates or amounts of reimbursement to which a district is entitled
or for which the State is liable. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
603.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
